name: colord
deps: dbus, glib, lcms, sqlite, gobject_introspection, libgudev, libgusb, polkit, vala, gnome_desktop, bash_completion
desc:
Colord is a system service that makes it easy to manage, install, 
and generate color profiles. It is used mainly by GNOME Color Manager 
for system integration and use when no users are logged in.
